20110124070149.000|20110124070152.000|CC1|PNEUMONIA.                      
20110124070152.000|20110124070152.000|CC1|>> Reporter: JOVANA, JACK       
20110124070152.000|20110124070153.000|CC1|LaLANNE'S LONG LIFE IS A        
20110124070153.000|20110124070156.000|CC1|TESTAMENT TO THE BENEFITS OF    
20110124070156.000|20110124070159.000|CC1|HEALTH AND FITNESS.             
20110124070159.000|20110124070201.000|CC1|HE OFTEN DEMONSTRATED AMAZING   
20110124070201.000|20110124070203.000|CC1|FEATS OF STRENGTH AND ENDURANCE.
20110124070203.000|20110124070206.000|CC1|HE PROBABLY DID MORE THAN ANYONE
20110124070206.000|20110124070210.000|CC1|TO RAISE AWARENESS OF HEALTHY   
20110124070210.000|20110124070212.000|CC1|EATING AND EXERCISING.          
20110124070212.000|20110124070214.000|CC1|>> MOST AMERICANS GOT TO KNOW   
20110124070214.000|20110124070215.000|CC1|JACK LaLANNE THROUGH            
20110124070215.000|20110124070216.000|CC1|TELEVISION.                     
20110124070216.000|20110124070220.000|CC1|HIS WORKOUT SHOW WAS A FIXTURE. 
20110124070220.000|20110124070222.000|CC1|HE INSPIRED VIEWERS TO EAT WELL,
20110124070222.000|20110124070224.000|CC1|LOSE WEIGHT, AND WORK OUT.      
20110124070224.000|20110124070227.000|CC1|HE WAS THE GODFATHER OF FITNESS.
20110124070227.000|20110124070229.000|CC1|HE MAINTAINED AN IMPRESSIVE     
20110124070229.000|20110124070231.000|CC1|PHYSIQUE, AND HE NEVER LOST HIS 
20110124070231.000|20110124070233.000|CC1|ENTHUSIASM FOR FITNESS.         
20110124070233.000|20110124070235.000|CC1|AS A CHILD, LaLANNE WAS         
20110124070235.000|20110124070239.000|CC1|ADDICTED TO SUGAR.              
20110124070239.000|20110124070243.000|CC1|THEN HE ATTENDED A LECTURE ON   
20110124070243.000|20110124070244.000|CC1|FITNESS.                        
20110124070244.000|20110124070246.000|CC1|>> I HAVE ONE THING ON MY MINE  
20110124070246.000|20110124070250.000|CC1|TO HELP PEOPLE FEEL BETTER, LIVE
20110124070250.000|20110124070251.000|CC1|LONGER.                         
20110124070251.000|20110124070252.000|CC1|>> HE CHANGED HIS BODY.         
20110124070252.000|20110124070255.000|CC1|LaLANNE DESIGNED AND INVENTED   
20110124070255.000|20110124070256.000|CC1|STRENGTH MACHINES STILL USED IN 
20110124070256.000|20110124070258.000|CC1|THE FITNESS INDUSTRY.
